Model.Player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Player.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputerPlayer, HumanPlayer, SocketPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class generalizes all other Player classes. Created by Martijn on 11-1-2016.

      • validateMove

        private void validateMove(Move move,
                Board board)
                   throws InvalidMoveException
        Checks whether a move is valid. If a move is invalid, throws an InvalidMoveException.
        Parameters:
        move - The Move that is to be validated.
        board - The Board that the Move is to be validated on.
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - When the move is invalid.
